original_text: And he carried out thence all the treasures of the house of the Lord, and the treasures of the king's house, and cut in pieces all the vessels of gold which Solomon king of Israel had made in the temple of the Lord, as the Lord had said.
korean_text: 그가 여호와의 성전의 모든 보물과 왕궁 보물을 집어내고 또 이스라엘의 왕 솔로몬이 만든 것 곧 여호와의 성전의 금 그릇을 다 파괴하였으니 여호와의 말씀과 같이 되었더라

sentences.original_text: And he carried out thence all the treasures
of the house of the Lord
and the treasures of the king's house
and cut in pieces all the vessels of gold
which Solomon king of Israel had made
in the temple of the Lord
